title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
When performing the following steps:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify the java file (e.g., move an existing class)
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon
A dialog window will appear.
4) Browse for a valid container location
5) Type the filename, but ignore the extension (which is not requested)
6) Click Ok

It is observed that the Navigator panel adds the file in the specified location, but without showing any file extension.
EB: The expected behavior is that when saving a file using SaveAs, the file should be added in the specified location with the correct file extension. Additionally, the icon of the saved file should retain the java file icon, rather than changing to a generic file icon.
SR:
To reproduce the bug:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify the java file (e.g., move an existing class)
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon
A dialog window will appear.
4) Browse for a valid container location
5) Type the filename, but ignore the extension (which is not requested)
6) Click Ok

Observe that the Navigator panel adds the file in the specified location, but without showing any file extension.
